scripts.serve: xcopy client\config.json output\*.* /Y && parcel serve --open -d output -p 2222 --no-cache client/index.html
scripts.serve_x: cp -a client/config.json output && parcel serve --open -d output -p 2222 --no-cache client/index.html
scripts.build_site: xcopy client\config.json dist\*.* /Y /I && parcel build -d dist --public-url . --no-minify client/index.html
scripts.build: rimraf -rf dist bin && npm run build_site
scripts.build_x: rm -rf dist bin && npm run build_site_x
